law.text: Any person who violates any of the provisions of KRS 186.695 shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, and upon conviction thereof shall be sentenced to pay a fine not exceeding five hundred dollars ($500) or be imprisoned for a term not to exceed six (6) months, or both.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 14, effective June 21, 1974. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 9.
